snippet: There are signs that the technology industry has entered another period of irrational exuberance.
abstract: Editorial cautions there are good reasons to worry that technology industry has entered period of irrational exuberance, and that bursting of this bubble could have far-reaching consequences; compares current period to that of the late 1990s; notes valuations of companies can outstrip their ability to make money for only so long.
lead_paragraph: There are signs that the technology industry has entered another period of irrational exuberance.

headline.main: Will Boom Lead to Bust in Silicon Valley?
headline.print_headline: Will Boom Lead to Bust in Silicon Valley?
